subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The overall race will most likely be won or lost on Thursday in the Tour de France’s final stage in the Pyrenees, a 108-mile mountain route atop Col du Tourmalet.
snippet: The overall race will most likely be won or lost on Thursday in the Tour de France’s final stage in the Pyrenees, a 108-mile mountain route atop Col du Tourmalet.
